code: import React from'react';import'./home.css';import BounceLoader from"react-spinners/BounceLoader";import{useMediaQuery}from'react-responsive';var Loader=function Loader(props){var isDesktopOrLaptop=useMediaQuery({query:'(min-width: 800px)'});console.log("Media query",isDesktopOrLaptop);var loaderContent="";if(isDesktopOrLaptop){loaderContent=React.createElement("div",{className:"sweet-loading",style:{position:'fixed',top:'50%',left:'47%'}},React.createElement(BounceLoader,{style:{display:'block',background:'#2b4fc4'},size:35,color:"#2b4fc4"}),React.createElement("span",{style:{position:'fixed',left:'46.5%',fontSize:'14px'}},"Loading"));}else{loaderContent=React.createElement("span",null);}return loaderContent;};export default Loader;
